## Bug Description
A clear description of what the bug is.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain the problem.

## Environment
- **OS**: [e.g., Windows 11, macOS 14, Ubuntu 22.04]
